name: Count Loretto Cocktail
description: Fernet Branca is an acquired taste, but has become a favored shot of bartenders on both coasts. This drink is very sippable, but has been known to be poured in to a few shot glasses and enjoyed more vigorously as well. Either way, cheers!
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce Mount Gay Eclipse dark rum

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a mixing glass with ice, then add bourbon, Fernet, and rum. Stir until very cold. Strain into a chilled rocks glass. Garnish with orange twist.
Alternately, strain into three shot glasses, wave the orange peel over them while twisting, and shoot.
